sections.description: Shiprocket WooCommerce Integration provides real-time shipping rates and pincode serviceability check for your WooCommerce store using the official Shiprocket API.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.8

  • CRITICAL FIX: Resolved fatal PHP parse error preventing plugin activation
  • Fixed syntax error with unexpected variable outside function scope
  • Properly structured calculate_shipping() function
  • Enhanced code organization and error handling

Version 1.0.7

  • Complete implementation of official Shiprocket API User authentication
  • Bearer token authentication following official documentation
  • Enhanced security with official authentication methods

Previous Versions

  • See full changelog on GitHub releases page

upgrade_notice: CRITICAL UPDATE: Version 1.0.8 fixes a fatal PHP parse error that prevented plugin activation. Update immediately if experiencing activation issues.
